attributes.action: urgently obtain a fair, just and negotiated settlement to the current dispute between Royal Mail and The CWU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The CWU urges all signatories to this petition to support EDM 2806. We call upon The Government to settle the current dispute & also review the impact of competition on postal services in the interests of all concerned. Please contact your local MP and request their immediate support for your local postal workers
